titles.title: Victims of Crime Amendments Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Victims of Crime Act of 1984 to modify the Fund established by that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 12/1/1987--Introduced. Victims of Crime Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends the Victims of Crime Act of 1984 to: (1) eliminate the cap on deposits to the Crime Victims Fund; (2) make authority for such Fund permanent; and (3) earmark Fund deposits exceeding a specified amount in any fiscal year for crime victim compensation and State and Federal crime victim assistance programs.
